name: Expand N Conquer
description:
Expand N Conquer

A real-time civ building mobile game where you start a kingdom and take over the world!

Known Issues: When starting a game, you may not be able to start a kingdom, Just restart the game and this should be fixed. In App Purchases are not yet fully functional. Load Game has no functionality. No pause button.

QUESTIONNAIRE

https://forms.gle/u5aGhCRHjnvEewEq6
